summary: A lore-friendly, handsome male Nord follower with a custom head mesh.
descriptionHtml:
[size=4]What is this mod?[/size]
This mod adds a new male Nord follower to the game named Mikal. His head is a custom mesh made with Racemenu.

[u]Location:[/u] Riverwood Inn (I know, so original. I may change this if it annoys enough people)

[size=5]Requirements[/size]
Although his custom head mesh is included, his hair is not. You will need to install [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54254/?]Howitzer's Hair[/url] for this mod to work. It's a great hair mod anyway so you should install it regardless. Don't forget to endorse!

If you want Mikal to have the bandit voice you need to install a mod that adds follower dialogue to the Bandit voice type. I suggest [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/74568/?]Relationship Dialogue Overhaul[/url], but any like it will do.

[size=4]Appearance In-Game[/size]
Aside from the hair and face shape, Mikal will use whatever aesthetic mods you have installed.

[u]Here's a list of what I'm using in the screenshots:[/u]
 [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/4141/?]Geonox Male Face Textures[/url] [b][color=#ff0000]HIGHLY RECOMMEND[/color][/b]
SOS (go look on the naughty site) + [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34438/?tab=1&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmoddescription%2F%3Fid%3D34438%26preview%3D&pUp=1]Subtle Male Skeleton[/url] (SOS version)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24909/?]aMidianBorn Book of Silence[/url] armours

[size=4]Heads Up[/size]
This is my first follower mod and although I have tested him I may have missed something. If you find any problems relating to Mikal (even if it's to do with the way he interacts with another mod) please let me know.
author: Ludaus
